by.khmyl.cafe.dao.impl

Class UserDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.khmyl.cafe.dao.AbstractDAO
      • by.khmyl.cafe.dao.UserDAO
        • by.khmyl.cafe.dao.impl.UserDAOImpl

  • public class UserDAOImpl
extends UserDAO
    Creates a connection to database with the help of ConnectionPool, and realizes a set of requests to database for user.
